description: To address CVE-2023-36028, it is essential to apply the relevant security updates for the affected systems. This includes Windows Server 2016, Windows 10 versions, and Windows 11 for x64-based systems. The patches include KB-5032199 for Windows 10 (10.0.10240.20308), KB-5032192 for Windows 11 (10.0.22621.2715), and KB-5032190 for Windows 11 (10.0.25398.531). Ensure that your systems are updated through the Windows Update service or by directly downloading the required KB articles from the Microsoft Update Catalog. The links for the updates are as follows: https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032197, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032192, https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5032190. This will help mitigate the issues related to the remote code execution vulnerability associated with PEAP.
